title: The OC asks a question
author: VD
content_html:
Headline: Games industry is ‘failing women’
Subhead: Game makers need to make titles women want to play

[My rhetorical question: why?]

I wonder why the BBC hasn’t published a similar story about how the romance novel industry is ‘failing men’. Obviously, they want to ruin video games for male entertainment in much the same way they have ruined television, not that I’m shedding any tears for that myself.
